forceGarbageCollector()method
public static function forceGarbageCollector(main:Object, connectionName:String):void

Method to force the gc. You pass the main application and after the Event.ENTER_FRAME is called twice the gc will mark and sweep.

Parameters

main:Object
 
connectionName:String (default = NaN)
